price: Every soul will be paid in full for what it has done, for He knows best[21] what they do.
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ
footnotes: [21] In addition to its own knowledge of what it has done.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
